question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/config.rs] [Function: run()] [Serve address extraction] At lines 199 and 216, listen_address is extracted by cloning from config - can an attacker exploit use-after-move bugs if the config is moved while these addresses are still being used by the spawned tasks? (Medium)
